citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:40pm on
September 8, 2021.
Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted by phone, stating they were out of town and no one would be available for an
inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:40pm on 
September 8, 2021. 
 
Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted by phone, stating they were out of town and no one would be available for an 
inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
